Room.Name: Turbulent Air
Room.ShortDescription: You are in very turbulent air, riding a bucking dragon. 50.n0.e0.s1.w3
Room.LongDescription: To the west is the Vallenda Pass, which provides a caravan trail for commerce between the seaport at Oceancrest and the inland towns and cities. On the south side of the pass is the Nartiz Mountain Range, while to the north is the mountain home of a clan of trolls.
